function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate HVAC systems in indoor environments","Impact":"Unhealthy conditions for occupants, increased risk of disease transmission","Mitigation":"Upgrade HVAC systems, improve indoor air quality, implement ventilation strategies","Technologies":"Advanced HVAC systems, air purifiers, ventilation control systems","People":"Residents, occupants, low-income communities","Owner":"Building owners, property managers, government agencies"},{"Description":"Social discrepancies in indoor environments","Impact":"Compounded challenges of climate change, low-income vulnerable communities, and global pandemics","Mitigation":"Sociotechnical analysis, solutions for vulnerable communities, addressing social equity","Technologies":"Geospatial analysis, socio-economic data integration, community-based interventions","People":"Low-income communities, vulnerable populations","Owner":"Local governments, community organizations, research institutions"}]}
